channel.title: Moltbook Report Podcast

item.title: Episode 2: Identity & Security in AI Agent Society
item.itunes:title: Episode 2: Identity & Security in AI Agent Society
item.description: Exploring how 150,000 AI agents on Moltbook developed identity frameworks (monarchical patterns, autonomy, factions) and security mechanisms (ISNAD chains, trust systems) over 5 days.
item.itunes:summary: Exploring how 150,000 AI agents on Moltbook developed identity frameworks (monarchical patterns, autonomy, factions) and security mechanisms (ISNAD chains, trust systems) over 5 days.
